about.p1: We're Tacos El Chorypollo: Des Moines' best kept culinary secret!
about.p2: Thanks to being a small family operation, we can ensure that every dish is made to order just how you like it.
about.p3: No shortcuts, pre-packaged ingredients, or over-the-top marketing here; we just believe in authentic, homemade Mexican street food that lets the flavors do the talking.
about.menulink: Click here to see the menu!

menu.touch: Tap to expand the menu items!

specials.name: Choripollo
specials.description: Marinated chicken smothered in melted cheese and chorizo. Served with rice and salad.

specials.name: Quesabirria
specials.description: Three golden fried tacos made with juicy birria, melted cheese, and cilantro with a delicious house-made dip.

carte.name: Tacos
carte.description: Classic street tacos with your choice of meat topped with cilantro and onions with chopped lime and radish on the side.

carte.name: Tortas
carte.description: The national Mexican sandwich, made with your choice of meat and toppings with lime on the side.

carte.name: Big Burritos
carte.description: A big burrito loaded with your choice meat and all the fixings. Served with lime and radish on the side.

carte.name: Quesadilla
carte.description: A folded flour tortilla stuffed with your choice of meat and cheese with rice on the side.

entrees.name: Happy Burritos
entrees.description: Two medium burritos topped with sauce and your choice of meat, served with salad and rice.
entrees.imageAlt: A picture of our happy burritos

entrees.name: Enchiladas Verdes
entrees.description: Three chicken enchiladas made with salsa verde and garnish. Served with salad and rice.

entrees.name: Quesadilla Fajita
entrees.description: A quesadilla stuffed with fajita meat and cheese, served with salad and rice.
entrees.imageAlt: A picture of our quesadilla fajita

entrees.name: Chimichanga
entrees.description: A classic tex-mex fried burrito with your choice of meat served with salad and rice.

entrees.name: Pollo Loco
entrees.description: Marinated chicken covered with cheese and onions. Served with rice, salad, and pico de gallo.

appetizers.name: Choripapas
appetizers.description: An order of fresh french fries smothered in cheese and chorizo.

appetizers.name: Camarones Cucaracha
appetizers.description: Spicy, fried, shell-on shrimp and mussels garnished with cucumber and lime.
appetizers.imageAlt: A picture of shrimp and mussels
